account_code_blocks.name: sample_manifest
account_code_blocks.content: <script> console.log('**SAMPLE MANIFEST OUTPUT TEST**'); </script><script>"use strict";var blackBgToggle=!!"{{ black_bg_toggle }}".length&&JSON.parse("{{ black_bg_toggle }}"),pinkBorderToggle=!!"{{ pink_border_toggle }}".length&&JSON.parse("{{ pink_border_toggle }}"),appTest=function(){blackBgToggle&&document.body.classList.add("black-bg"),pinkBorderToggle&&document.body.classList.add("pink-border")};appTest();</script>
account_code_blocks.description: This is a sample manifest outputting fields to the console

config_fields.name: black_bg_toggle
config_fields.label: Toggle to add .black-bg class to body to change background colour using css stylesheet

config_fields.name: pink_border_toggle
config_fields.label: Toggle to add .pink-border class to body to add border using css stylesheet

config_fields.name: debug_mode
config_fields.label: Debug Mode for Developers
config_fields.description: For developer debugging purposes, when enabled check the console logs for detailed info on the operation of this app.
